attributes.action: Declare Pakistan Terrorist Nation without any delay to Save Humanity & World.
attributes.additional_details:
Pakistan ISI is responsible for Jihadis Terror Attack occurring all over world - USA, France, India, Afghanistan, Bangladesh, Germany & links to all these Terrorists are from Pakistan. 

UN Designated Terrorists Organizations JaisheMohammad, Haqqani, JamaiteIslami & UN Designated Terrorists Hafiz Saeed, Syed Sallauddin openly addresses Huge Public rallies inside Pakistan.

Pakistan threatens using Nuclear Bomb like North Korea, but then why sanctions only against North Korea and not Pakistan?
attributes.background:
World can't keep ignoring real Terror Jihadi threats emanating ONLY from ONE Country Pakistan & Declare Pakistan Terrorist Nation without any delay to Save Humanity.
Pakistan Army is running ISIS Jihadis Terror Training Camps inside Pakistan.

rejection.details: The United Kingdom does not declare nations to be "Terrorist States". However you may wish to sign this petition, which we think is similar to yours: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/168107
